entry.title: Lightning Talks
entry.summary:
Description

Lightning talks! 5 minutes! GO!

  • Why would a journalist want to learn Python? — Philip Nye
  • Story detection using LDAs — Hendrik Heuer
  • A model may be right, but irrelevant — Maria Koroliuk
  • Why I love the days I get to optimise things — Gemma Hentsch
  • Ethics? & Data Science ... — Roelof Pieters
  • Love letter to Russel Winder — Tony Simpson
  • Let's go to Mars — Juan Luis Cano
  • Testing with Hypothesis — David McGiver
  • Introducing (Plotly) Widgets — Carole Griffiths

... DONE!
